People think mastering AI is hard. It’s not.

I found 13 free guides so you don’t have to:

1. OpenAI Academy - https://lnkd.in/dTihMw_M 
The official place to learn how to prompt ChatGPT.

2. Gemini Guide - https://lnkd.in/dcZHd7P6 
Google’s own guide to writing better prompts.

3. Anthropic Academy - anthropic.com/learn 
The best place to learn Claude, official source.

4. How to Prompt - https://lnkd.in/dGYgcQ_7 
A simple, clear guide to writing prompts that work.

5. 7 Prompting Sins - https://lnkd.in/duP3Za5W 
Avoid the most common mistakes in AI prompting.

6. GPT write your thesis - youtu.be/FPO5X8hyQhw 
A step-by-step video for students and researchers.

7. OpenAI Prompt Pack - https://lnkd.in/dUCPHx8S 
A collection of ready-to-use prompts for any task.

8. Nano Banana Guide - https://lnkd.in/d7xW8Qze 
A fun, practical guide to creative AI prompts.

9. Veo Prompting Guide - https://lnkd.in/dbhDqqcp 
The official resource for Google’s Veo video model.

10. ChatGPT 5 guide - https://lnkd.in/dqMu3c2d 
A quick reference for how to best use ChatGPT.

11. Research paper on prompting - arxiv.org/pdf/2406.06608 
Free to download prompt engineering playbook.

12. Sora Guide - https://lnkd.in/duKb5ZhA 
The latest tips for using Sora.

13. Copy paste prompts - https://lnkd.in/e24w8VHk
If you want to move faster, this is your shortcut.

You find this list helpful?

♻️ So repost this PDF to help your network, too.
